arts.ttl: Liverpool vs Crystal Palace predictions: Reds to get revenge on Palace
arts.sum: Elliott Bretland believes Liverpool can finally get one over on Crystal Palace this season by securing a victory from Wednesday's League Cup tie at Anfield.

arts.ttl: Key Palace player to miss Liverpool as Glasner names two starters
arts.sum: Crystal Palace defender Chris Richards has been ruled out of Wednesday’s clash with Liverpool in the fourth round of the League Cup. The Eagles travel to Anfield this week to battle Arne Slot’s out-of-form side for a place in the last-eight of the competition. arts.ttl: Liverpool vs Crystal Palace Prediction: Can Eagles Maintain Good Record Against Reds in EFL Cup?
arts.sum: Arne Slot's out-of-form Reds face a team they've failed to beat in two meetings this season when Oliver Glasner's men visit Anfield. Look ahead to the game with our Liverpool vs Crystal Palace prediction and preview.
